overview: Set during the independence war against the Dutch in Tanah Karo (South Sumatra), the action takes place in Seberaja, the village that was the center of command. Deputy Commander Rusli is injured and is taken care of by Tipi. Love grows between them but the situation makes it impossible for them to stay together. As the Dutch troops attack, guided by the traitorous spy, Dendam, the fighters are forced to keep changing their position.
title: Turang
